metadata.title: CVE-2024-27402 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phonet/pep: fix racy skb_queue_empty() useThe receive queues are protected by their respective spin-lock, notthe socket lock. This could lead to skb_peek() unexpectedlyreturning NULL or a pointer to an already dequeued socket buffer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
